eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 11:27 AM ON DEC 01, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 07:27 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for Phoenix, Arizona. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix Police is looking for Ricardo Gibson, 66 years-of-age, 5 feet 10 inches tall, 190 pounds with gray hair and brown eyes. Ricardo was last seen on Thursday, 11/27/2025 wearing a blue tank top, gray shorts, gray shoes, with a brown cane. Ricardo Gibson left the area of North 30th Street and East Sweetwater Avenue. Ricardo suffers from a condition that may cause him to appear confused and forgetful. Please contact the Phoenix Police Department with any information.

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
